Functions

util_pool_sync_query
[Pool References]

Functions

void * util_pool_sync_query (handle_t section, util_pool_t *pool)

Function Documentation

void* util_pool_sync_query ( handle_t  section,
util_pool_t *  pool 
)

The util_pool_sync_query routine can be used by an application to query an object. Checking the pool for an object is blocked for other processes or threads at this time. If the pool contains at least one object, the object will be removed from the management list and returned by leaving this routine.

Parameters:
section references the critical section (see OSAL).
pool Specifies the pool resource.
Returns:
A reference to an object indicates success. NULL indicates an empty queue.
See also:
util_pool_sync_insert
